definition: self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
to wipe out dissenters/to exterminate those who disagree

sentences.english: Xie Hui could go with the stream and assist the new ruler, but he was still regarded as a dissident.
sentences.chinese: 谢晦虽能顺应潮流，佐命新朝，但终被视为异己。

sentences.english: When considering the pizza preferences of the dissimilar person, this brain region did not come into play.
sentences.chinese: 而考虑异己者对披萨的偏好时，这片脑区毫无动静。

sentences.english: Concertos, it seemed, would be written as long as the idea of the one against the many remained relevant.
sentences.chinese: 看来，创作协奏曲是一种能排除异己的方式。

sentences.english: All the enemy combatants and dissenters appear to be captured.
sentences.chinese: 所有的敌方战斗人员和异己分子似乎都被抓获了。

sentences.english: They oppose communism, purge those who hold different views, hinder progress and favor retrogression.
sentences.chinese: 宣传反共，排除异己，反对进步，鼓励倒退。

definition: to be narrowly partisan/to unite with those of the same views but alienate those with different views
to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
